main: ^Reyes! Where have you been? I've been worried sick!
^I was with Harper. Don’t worry about it.
^What do you mean? Where did you go?
^No! I’m tired of you saying not to worry about you!
^Carmen takes a deep breath, preparing herself.
^Ever since you came back from that school you’ve been acting strange, mija. Talk to me. Please.
^I've been trying to tell you for so long… I'm not who you think I am, Mom. I'm like her. I'm exactly like Harper. I'm not the daughter you thought I was.
^I feel trapped. I feel lost. I didn’t like being at school because people constantly looked at me like I didn’t belong there. But home isn't better.
^The people who've seen me grow up in this town still constantly criticize me. It doesn’t help when you tell them how I feel about how I look, Ma.

^My own friend, who I'm supposed to relate to, is so different from me. She doesn't understand that I don't just have extra money to spend, but I can’t force her to understand that, especially when she's lived her whole life like that.
arg1: ^don't know how to express myself here.
^don't feel like I fit in at all.
arg2var1: ^I just don't know how to express myself here.
^Reyes, what do you mean? You have family here who takes care of you. Why are you feeling this way?
^I don't wanna be here anymore, Mom. I just want to be in bed right now...
^Is it because you don't have a job? I know I've been asking you about it, but I just want you to be able to have something to sustain yourself.
^Mom, I <i>really<i/> don't want to talk about this right now.
^But you're obviously so upset, mija. Please, help me understand.
^to explain this to you right now!
^to tell you how to treat me better!
^to ask you to help me anymore.
arg2var2: ^I just don't feel like I fit in at all.
^Reyes, what do you mean? You have family here who takes care of you. Why are you feeling this way?
^I don't wanna be here anymore, Mom. I just want to be in bed right now...
^Is it because you don't have a job? I know I've been asking you about it, but I just want you to be able to have something to sustain yourself.
^Mom, I <i>really<i/> don't want to talk about this right now.
^But you're obviously so upset, mija. Please, help me understand.
^to explain this to you right now!
^to tell you how to treat me better!
^to ask you to help me anymore.
arg2var3: ^I just feel like I'm not happy.
^Reyes, what do you mean? You have family here who takes care of you. Why are you feeling this way?
^I don't wanna be here anymore, Mom. I just want to be in bed right now...
^Is it because you don't have a job? I know I've been asking you about it, but I just want you to be able to have something to sustain yourself.
^Mom, I <i>really<i/> don't want to talk about this right now.
^But you're obviously so upset, mija. Please, help me understand.
^to explain this to you right now!
^to tell you how to treat me better!
^to ask you to help me anymore.
arg3var1: ^Mom, I'm not going to explain this to you right now!
^Carmen cups Reyes' cheek, wiping the tears away from their eyes.
^I feel like I need to help you fix whatever is going on. Tell me how.
^You can't, Mom. You made me feel this way...
^Everyone made me feel this way. I don't need this help... I just...
arg3var2: ^Mom, I'm not going to tell you how to treat me better!
^Carmen cups Reyes' cheek, wiping the tears away from their eyes.
^I feel like I need to help you fix whatever is going on. Tell me how.
^You can't, Mom. You made me feel this way...
^Everyone made me feel this way. I don't need this help... I just...
arg3var3: ^Mom, I'm not going to ask you to help me anymore.
^Carmen cups Reyes' cheek, wiping the tears away from their eyes.
^I feel like I need to help you fix whatever is going on. Tell me how.
^You can't, Mom. You made me feel this way...
^Everyone made me feel this way. I don't need this help... I just...
end: ^I feel so disconnected from myself… I don’t know where I belong anymore. I just want to be treated like a person.
^Reyes' outburst sends their heart into a frenzy. The only thing they can think of right now is to escape to their room.
